show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: Jin Shin Jyutsu
content:
Ellen Kamhi, PhD , RN. www.naturalnurse.com, interviews Jed Schwartz about HEALTH IS IN YOUR HANDS, Jin Shin Jyutsu. … Jed graduated from the University of Maryland’s School of Physical Therapy in 1977, specializing in Pediatric Rehabilitation.
In High School Jed became interested in alternative methods to help heal the body and began a journey to discover modalities that he could use to help others.
In 1981 he met Mary Burmeister and the Art of Jin Shin Jyutsu.
His search had ended and just begun with the Art of Jin Shin Jyutsu.
The awaking that the truth lay inside oneself drew Jed to this Art which brought together all of the other studies he had done.
Jed became a practitioner of Jin Shin Jyutsu in 1984 and discontinued his work in Physical Therapy in 1987 in order to commit to a full time study and practice.
In 1995 he was selected to be on the faculty of the Jin Shin Jyutsu Inc.
, and is one of 25 international instructors.
Jed has taught classes in North and South America, Europe, the Middle East and New Zealand.
He continues to have a full-time Jin Shin Jyutsu practice in New York City and Woodstock, New York.
 Contact: https://www.jsjinc.net
